name: Fighting Game Development Club @ ICU
description:
THE WEB BUILD DOES NOT SUPPORT ONLINE. sorry. pensive emoji.

Keyboard Controls:
Arrow keys to move.
A for a light attack, S for a heavy attack.

Controller Controls:
Stick or Dpad to move.
Face buttons to attack. (The left and bottom ones are light, the up and right ones are heavy.)

Attacks and Movements:
Universal: Light, Heavy, Crouching Light, Crouching Heavy, Jumping Light, Jumping Heavy, Throw (both buttons).
Batperson: Airdash (double tap forward or back). Fireball (Quarter circle forward + button).
Example: Superjump (down, up), Dragon Punch (Forward, down, down-forward + button).

Normal fighting game conventions apply, but to be explicit:

  • Hold backwards to block. (Hold down so you don't move backwards. However, look out for aerial attacks, and let go of down!)
  • When you are thrown, input throw ASAP to break out!
